title: why i don't enjoy silver... will it ever end
body:
Hey guys, long time listener, first time caller.

So my main is silver. I don't play too often, just a blast when i get the odd day off work. Yesterday was one of those days.

I played 5 games. All of them had afks. went 0/5.

Then, just logged in to this guy (**attached**). Whenever doesnt get favourable champ select, drops this crap.

Please... is there something being done to stop this?

replies.body: No naming and shaming on the forums dude, Riot will probably remove your photo if you don't edit it out.

You really think Riot will do anything lol

Maybe EUW but you are entitled to dream on OCE

Either a) Dodge (only lose 3LP, basically nothing) and save your time but let him get away with it; or b)Play the game out anyway, he will either start playing because he doesn't want to get banned/get banned for afking/dodge himself because he was lying about not being able to dodge.

People do this because presumably there's a fairly high chance one of their teammates will dodge, which is the case because many people would rather lose 5 minutes and a few LP than risk losing 20+ mins and more LP. Kinda need some way to report people in champ select.
that guy took jungle cos he didnt want you afk farming with shyv lel. he da real mvp
To answer your question: No. It never ends. The quality of game play gets better, but the quality of people is exactly the same. Always trolls, afks, ragers no matter what elo you are in.
